home.greeting: Hi, I'm Fatih Al Jabar H.M.
home.description: A Software Engineer and Front-End specialist dedicated to building impactful digital solutions. I specialize in developing scalable web platforms using a modern tech stack, primarily {techStack}. My focus is on crafting software architecture that is well-structured, maintainable, and aligned with business goals.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A brief introduction to who I am.
about.content: I'm Fatih Al Jabar H.M., a {location}-based Software Engineer dedicated to building impactful digital solutions. I specialize in developing web platforms and mobile applications using a modern tech stack, including Next.js, TypeScript, and native Android development. My primary focus is crafting software architecture that doesn't just work but is well-structured, maintainable, and scalable to meet business needs. I believe that high-quality code must go hand-in-hand with system efficiency and logical clarity. I blend technical expertise with proactive communication, critical thinking, and effective time management. I thrive in collaborative environments and leverage leadership skills to ensure every project delivers optimal results and a real-world impact.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
responsibilities.item_1: Collaborated in a team of 4 to develop {project}, a web-based concert ticket management platform.
responsibilities.item_2: Designed and implemented a responsive Front-End user interface using {tech1} and {tech2}.
responsibilities.item_3: Developed RESTful APIs and managed server-side logic using {tech}.
responsibilities.item_4: Implemented features such as ticket search, booking system, user authentication, and data management.
responsibilities.item_5: Managed version control and team collaboration using Git and GitHub.

learned.title: What I Learned
learned.item_1: Mastered web fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JS) and advanced concepts like DOM Manipulation & Async JS.
learned.item_2: Gained hands-on experience in building scalable RESTful APIs and database schema design.
learned.item_3: Enhanced soft skills: Time Management, Effective Communication, and Growth Mindset.

impact.title: Impact
impact.item_2: Successfully launched the platform accessible at {link}.
impact.item_3: Received positive feedback from mentors regarding UI/UX design and functionality.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.subtitle: A curated collection of certificates and badges I've earned throughout my professional and academic journey.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of both private and open-source projects I've built or contributed to.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's get in touch. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
contact.project_inquiry_desc: Reach out via email for business inquiries, collaborations, or just to say hello. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.message_placeholder: Hi Fatih, I'd like to talk about...
